message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product for $9,500.  I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe this product offers significant value at $9,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider $8,750? I think that's a fair compromise.
